creditline: Gift from the Helen D. Ling Collection in celebration of the 100th anniversary of the Minneapolis Institute of Art
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: five children seated around a square white game board (?) with black lines and black and white circles in geometric formation; small yellow bag to right of second child from left, wearing pale blue-green tunic; tan wall behind children, with arched doorway and lattice gate; two haystacks or cone-shaped thatched roofs behind wall; inscription in black at left edge with red oval seal
title: Children playing a game with a geometric board (?)
